translations: [水文]间歇泉；[水文]间歇喷泉（geyser 的复数形式）

sentences.translation: 火山和间歇喷泉均能喷发。

sentences.sentence: A legendary she-bear from the Valley of Geysers named Darkpaw.
sentences.translation: 一只从间歇湖泉谷来的传奇母熊darkpaw。

sentences.sentence: There are more geysers in this park than anywhere else in the world.
sentences.translation: 在这个公园里有着比世界其他任何地方更多的间歇喷泉。
